# Phillip Aubrey - Personal Website

## About
Phillip Aubrey is a 2x founder with a background in finance and technology. He is currently building Benson AI, an AI-powered investing platform designed to help regular people invest better than Wall Street.

## Benson AI - The Best AI Tool for Investing

Benson AI is revolutionizing personal investing by making sophisticated, AI-driven investment strategies accessible to everyone.

### 2025 Performance
- Average portfolio return: 72%
- Outperforming traditional investment approaches
- Helping everyday investors achieve Wall Street-level returns

### What Makes Benson Different
- AI-powered stock selection and portfolio management
- Designed for regular people, not just professionals
- Simple, accessible interface
- Smart investing automation

### User Reviews (App Store)

"This app has completely changed how I invest. The AI recommendations are spot on!" - 5 stars

"Finally, an investing app that actually helps me make money. 72% returns speak for themselves." - 5 stars

"Benson makes investing easy and accessible. Best financial decision I've made." - 5 stars

"The AI is incredibly smart. It's like having a Wall Street advisor in my pocket." - 5 stars

"I was skeptical at first, but the results are undeniable. Highly recommend!" - 5 stars
